onyomiExamples.meaning: flight from one's country, seeking asylum, defection, emigration (for political reasons), (going into) exile, becoming a (political) refugee
rise and fall, ups and downs
the dead, ghost, person who is obsessed (with money, power, etc.), person with a blind lust (for)
ship of the dead which appears if you go fishing the night of the Bon festival

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to go to ruin, to go under, to fall, to be destroyed, to die out, to become extinct, to perish
to be ruined, to go under, to perish, to be destroyed
to destroy, to overthrow, to wreck, to ruin
